dialogue: Wanna party??!
Once this was the coolest place in space
it's not anymore..
PARTYTIME!!
Look at the screen...
Greetings, traveler. What brings you do this desert planet?
While i wondered the desert i saw equipment suited for underwater planets. A bit strange considering theres no water here
Farewell traveler and good luck
Intruder! State your business!
A dog? I do not know what that is but there's certainly no such creature here!
Be careful not to step on our eggs!
THE HIVE IS FOREVER
You're still here? BE GONE HIVE INTRUDER!
Hello there little fellah
Is this your first time visiting this planet?
Did you know that space is infinite? but this planet is not
If you're not careful, I might bite you
leave me alone now thank you, I have things to take care of
Hello, I am underwater.
Why did the star decide to take a vacation? It needed some space.
I dont even know what a... dog is?
Smell ya later!
Hello there tiny creature. Please do not be alarmed by my appearance.
I sought out this small planet for solace.
However, I have a feeling this planet's name has a hidden meaning.
See that box down there? I cannot make any sense of it.
Good luck on your journey, space-thingy.
